alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:19PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Greenville and northern Spartanburg Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 419 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles south of Forest City to 12 miles northwest of Spartanburg to 14 miles north of Greenville Downtown. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spartanburg, Greer, Boiling Springs SC, Duncan, Lyman, Cowpens, Wellford, Inman, Mayo and Campobello. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Spartanburg
